titleStmt.title: Here all may see a clear distinction between the Old Covenant & Old Testament, and the New Covenant and New Testament and how that Christ hath abolished and taken away the first covenant and testament, and established the second / by G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
